subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Andrew Bynum had 23 points and 16 rebounds, and Pau Gasol had 20 points and 10 rebounds to help defending N.B.A. champion Dallas in overtime.
snippet: Andrew Bynum had 23 points and 16 rebounds, and Pau Gasol had 20 points and 10 rebounds to help defending N.B.A. champion Dallas in overtime.
